Name: Average time from Manuscript Export Succeeded to Plagiarism Originality Report Completed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed'

Name: Total time between Manuscript Export Succeeded and SW-Checklist Completed across all variants
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Minimum time it takes Manuscript Export Succeeded to be followed by SW-Awaiting AE Assignment
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'

Name: Average duration of the interval starting with Manuscript Export Succeeded and ending with SW-Reviewer Agreed in cases where SW-Reviewer Agreed eventually occurs
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total elapsed time from Manuscript Export Succeeded to SW-EIC Accept in accepted manuscript variants
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Average time from Manuscript Export Succeeded to the first occurrence of any reviewer-related activity (e.g., SW-Initial Reviewer Selection or SW-AE Assign Reviewers)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'

Name: Minimum time between Manuscript Export Succeeded and Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation in resubmission paths
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Average cycle time of Manuscript Export Succeeded when it appears multiple times in a case (e.g., at submission and post-acceptance)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Total time from Manuscript Export Succeeded to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants that reach editorial decision
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average waiting time from Manuscript Export Succeeded until the next non-system activity (considering performer context in ACM journal review process)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Minimum time between Manuscript Export Succeeded and First Look-Please submit updates in post-acceptance production variants
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'First Look-Please submit updates'

Name: Average time from Manuscript Export Succeeded to SW-Reviewer Agreed specifically in variants containing both activities, highlighting its role as a precursor to reviewer commitment
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total resolution time from Manuscript Export Succeeded to final disposition (e.g., SW-EIC Accept, SW-EIC Reject, or SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit) grouped by variant type
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Average time between Manuscript Export Succeeded and SW-Initial Reviewer Selection to assess editorial preparation latency
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'

Name: Elapsed time from Manuscript Export Succeeded to Awaiting Assignment to Batch in accepted manuscript pathways
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch'
